text: vastavaniki (badr yud'dha ranganlo) markonina a rendu vargalalo miku oka sucana undi. Oka vargam allah marganlo poradedi mariyu rendavadi satyatiraskaruladi. Varu (visvasulu) varini (satyatiraskarulanu) rettimpu sankhyalo unnatlu tama kallara cusaru. Mariyu allah tanu korina varini tana sahayanto (vijayanto) balaparustadu. Niscayanga, duradrsti galavariki indulo oka gunapathamundi
